data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Deschodt, Christian M., Davis, Adrian L. V., Sole, Catherine L. (2019): A beautiful new species of Hyalonthophagus Palestrini & Giacone, 1988 (Coleoptera Scarabaeidae: Scarabaeinae), from the Northern Cape Province, South Africa. Zootaxa 4648 (1): 194-200, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4648.1.12|10 occurrences
